targets.query:
from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_prices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name == "코스피" or r.name == "코스닥" or r.name == "KODEX200")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "close")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.name }))
  |> drop(columns: ["name", "ticker"])

from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_prices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name == "S&P500" or r.name == "나스닥" or r.name == "QQQ" or r.name == "SPY" or r.name == "DIA")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "close")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.name }))
  |> drop(columns: ["name", "ticker"])

from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "economic_indicators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.indicator =~ /한국 GDP.*실질.*전기비/ or r.indicator =~ /한국 GDP.*실질.*전년동기비/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 3mo, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.indicator }))
  |> drop(columns: ["indicator", "series_id", "period"])

from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "economic_indicators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.indicator == "미국 산업생산지수")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.indicator }))
  |> drop(columns: ["indicator", "series_id", "period"])

from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "economic_indicators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.indicator == "한국 소비자물가지수")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
                |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.indicator }))
                |> drop(columns: ["indicator", "series_id", "period"])

from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "economic_indicators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.indicator == "미국 CPI")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
                |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.indicator }))
                |> drop(columns: ["indicator", "series_id", "period"])

from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "economic_indicators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.indicator == "연방기금금리" or r.indicator == "미국 10년 국채금리")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.indicator }))
  |> drop(columns: ["indicator", "series_id", "period"])

from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "economic_indicators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.indicator == "USD/KRW 환율")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.indicator }))
  |> drop(columns: ["indicator", "series_id", "period"])

from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "economic_indicators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.indicator == "미국 10년 국채금리")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 100.0, _field: r.indicator }))
  |> drop(columns: ["indicator", "series_id", "period"])

from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_prices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name == "NAVER" or r.name == "카카오")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "close")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
            |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.name }))
            |> drop(columns: ["name", "ticker"])

from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_prices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name == "HYBE" or r.name == "SM" or r.name == "JYP Ent." or r.name == "크래프톤" or r.name == "엔씨소프트")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "close")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
            |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.name }))
            |> drop(columns: ["name", "ticker"])

from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_prices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name == "삼성전자" or r.name == "SK하이닉스" or r.name == "현대차" or r.name == "KB금융")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "close")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
            |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.name }))
            |> drop(columns: ["name", "ticker"])

from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_prices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r.name == "KODEX200" or
      r.name == "KODEX 코스닥150" or
      r.name == "TIGER 미국S&P500" or
      r.name == "TIGER 미국나스닥100"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "close")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.name }))
  |> drop(columns: ["name", "ticker"])

from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_prices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r.name == "KODEX 배당가치" or
      r.name == "TIGER 코리아배당다우존스" or
      r.name == "KODEX 국고채3년"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "close")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.name }))
  |> drop(columns: ["name", "ticker"])

from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_prices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r.name == "KODEX 골드선물(H)" or
      r.name == "KODEX 국고채3년"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "close")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.name }))
  |> drop(columns: ["name", "ticker"])

from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: 2020-02-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2020-04-30T23:59:59Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_prices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>

  |> drop(columns: ["name", "ticker"])

from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: 2020-02-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2020-04-30T23:59:59Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_prices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>

  |> drop(columns: ["name", "ticker"])

from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: 2020-02-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2020-04-30T23:59:59Z)

from(bucket: "econ_market")

from(bucket: "econ_market")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_prices")

      r.name == "KODEX200" or
      r.name == "KODEX 코스닥150" or
      r.name == "KODEX 배당가치" or

panels.title: 금리 사이클 - 한국 지수/배당 (성장 vs 가치)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_prices")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r.name == "SPY" or
      r.name == "QQQ" or
      r.name == "Global X S&P 500 Covered Call"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "close")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.name }))
  |> drop(columns: ["name", "ticker"])

panels.title: 금리 사이클 - 미국 지수/커버드콜 (성장 vs 인컴)

targets.query:
s0 = from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_prices" and r.name == "코스피" and r._field == "close")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

s0_first = s0 |> first() |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

s0_norm = s0
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / s0_first._value * 100.0, _field: "코스피"}))


s1 = from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_prices" and r.name == "코스닥" and r._field == "close")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

s1_first = s1 |> first() |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

s1_norm = s1
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / s1_first._value * 100.0, _field: "코스닥"}))


s2 = from(bucket: "econ_market")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_prices" and r.name == "KODEX200" and r._field == "close")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

s2_first = s2 |> first() |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

s2_norm = s2
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / s2_first._value * 100.0, _field: "KODEX200"}))

union(tables: [s0_norm, s1_norm, s2_norm])
